# Introduction

This vignette provides a detailed guide to the pedigree-related functions within the `BGmisc` package.

## Loading Required Libraries

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(BGmisc)

```

# Simulating Pedigree

```{r}

df_ped <- SimPed(kpc = 6, Ngen = 3, marR = .5)


PlotPedigree(df_ped )
```
